articles.author: Sarah Swain
articles.title: Woman finally gets to see dying dad after quarantine row and demands for $8000 plane - 9News
articles.description: An Australian woman has made it in time to see her dying father, after red tape and quarantine rules and a demand for her to spend $8000 on a private plane left her battling to be able to get there.
